main_definition: A unit of time equal to 60 seconds, or a small amount of time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Time measurement unit equal to one sixtieth of an hour

meanings_and_examples.example: It's just a minute difference between the two prices.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A formal complaint made about someone's behavior
meanings_and_examples.example: She filed a minute against her boss for unfair treatment.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An opportunity or opening in time to do something important
meanings_and_examples.example: When the door opened, there was only one minute before it closed again.
